articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Special Operation Battalion
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Special Operation Battalion
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), inspected a special operation battalion under KPA Unit 525.
					 He personally organized the battalion and made sure that its barracks were successfully built.
					
					 Going round the bedroom, education room, mess hall, general training hall and swimming drill pool of the battalion, he guided hurdle-overcoming training, general striking drill, shooting training, minimum altitude dropping training, drill for dropping from helicopters with the help of rope and assault training at the general outdoor drill ground. 
					
					 The combatants of the battalion having their basic mission to wipe out the human scum who have committed thrice-cursed high treasons, holding important posts at Chongwadae, the puppet government and the military, have fully displayed their capability to fulfill their duties independently and effectively.
					
					 He highly praised them for their successes in the drills, saying that all of them are one-match-for-a-hundred fighters with iron fists and they are crack shots as they hit all targets with pistols and automatic rifles.
					
					 Noting that the battalion is a combat unit to which the supreme commander attaches special importance and in which he reposes the deepest trust, he set forth the tasks facing the battalion.
					
					 Expressing expectation and conviction that the combatants of the battalion having an important mission to stab the enemy hearts with sharp daggers and break their backs would successfully carry out their honorable combat duty, he gave them a pair of binoculars and automatic rifle as gifts before having a photo session with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA Vice Marshal Ri Myong Su, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, and Army Col. General Ri Yong Gil, first vice-chief of the General Staff and director of the General Operation Bureau of the KPA.

articles.title: Youth and Students Organizations in North, South and Overseas Resolve to Shatter Japan's Reinvasion Moves
articles.content:
Youth and Students Organizations in North, South and Overseas Resolve to Shatter Japan's Reinvasion Moves
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Sub-committee of the North Side Committee, the Youth and Students Headquarters of the South Side Committee and the Youth and Students Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration issued a joint resolution on Nov. 3.
					 87 years have passed since the anti-Japanese struggle waged by the Korean students in Kwangju in protest against the barbarian colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists and their ferocious contempt and insult to Korean women students swept the whole of Korea, the resolution said, and went on:
					
					 The Kwangju student incident was an eruption of the pent-up grievance and resentment at the Japanese imperialists who inflicted all misfortune and pain on the Korean people through the brutal colonial rule after illegally occupying Korea and a righteous patriotic struggle of the Korean students to retake the freedom, independence and national dignity.
					
					 Japan, far from reflecting on and apologizing its past crimes, is mocking the Korean nation while distorting and denying its history of aggression.
					
					 Openly revealing its attempt at grabbing Tok Islets, Japan is putting bigger spurs to the moves for reviving militarism and launching reinvasion, intensifying political persecution and suppression of Koreans in Japan and persistently obstructing the reunification of Korea all its compatriots want.
					
					 Moreover, the anti-reunification forces' pro-Japanese act to connive at Japan's past crimes and open the way for the Japanese reactionaries to stage a comeback to Korea is stirring up great resentment of Korean youth and students at home and abroad.
					
					 The resolution continued:
					
					 Firstly, we will fight it out to let Japan make an apology and reparation for all crimes it committed against the Koreans after invading Korea.
					
					 Secondly, we will resolutely reject the moves of Japan for distorting history, grabbing Tok Islets, reviving militarism and reinvading Korea.
					
					 Thirdly, we will resolutely check the moves of the Japanese reactionaries to crack down on Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Fourthly, we will wage a more dynamic and patriotic movement for peace and independent reunification of the country under the unfurled banner of national independence and great national unity.
					
					 Fifthly, we will actively support the proposal for holding a nationwide great meeting for reunification sparking off the ardent response at home and abroad, successfully hold the great meeting of Korean youth in which youth and students of all social standings in the north, the south and abroad would take part as an immediate task and thus take the lead in opening up a new turning phase of national reunification.
					
					 To this end, we will hold a working-level contact of delegates of youth and students in the north, the south and abroad late in November or in the period to be agreed upon to discuss all practical issues for pushing forward the great meeting of Korean youth for reunification.
					
					 The resolution ardently called upon all the youth and students at home and abroad to turn out as one in the patriotic movement to hold the great meeting of Korean youth for reunification without fail and pave a wide avenue to peace and reunification of the country.

articles.title: Vietnamese Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Vietnamese Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Vietnamese newspaper Nhan Dan led by Deputy Editor-in-Chief Dinh Nhu Hoan left here for home Friday.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kumsong University of Politics Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kumsong University of Politics Marked
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- Kumsong University of Politics marked its 70th founding anniversary.
					 The university is a reliable center for training cadres of the Party to comprehensively train youth political workers and officials of working people's organizations.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, with deep insight into the importance of the work for training young cadres after the liberation of the country, founded the central school for training young cadres, the predecessor of Kumsong University of Politics, on Nov. 5, Juche 35 (1946). During the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War, too, he made sure that the work for training cadres was conducted without interruption and personally visited the university and wisely led the work to improve the education and management.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il reposed such profound trust in the university as seeing to it that the university went by the immortal august name given to the President by young communists in reverence for him and a new building of the university was built in the period when the country was suffering difficulties. And he energetically led the university to successfully carry out its mission and duty for training officials of the youth league and working people's organizations, repeatedly sending modern educational equipment to it. 
					
					 The seven decades-long history of the university is recorded with the proud feats it has performed by training reliable youth political workers and officials of working people's organizations who play a core role in the development of the youth league and working people's organizations after having an able educational force and a firm material and technical foundation thanks to the great leaders' original policy of training officials of working people's organizations and their loving care. 
					
					 A meeting for marking the anniversary was held on Friday.
					
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), officials of the Party Central Committee, working people's organizations and institutions for training the party cadres, officials concerned and teachers and students of the university.
					
					 A congratulatory message of the WPK Central Committee to the teachers and students of the university was read out at the meeting.
					
					 At the end of the meeting, the participants went round the exhibition of educational and scientific achievements of the university and enjoyed an art performance given by its teachers and students.

articles.title: 47th Sports Contest of Artistes Held
articles.content:
47th Sports Contest of Artistes Held
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The 47th sports contest of artistes took place at the Kim Il Sung Stadium on Friday.
					 The contest was divided into the movie art, stage art and art education groups. They competed in football, volleyball, athletics, tug of war and other events.
					
					 Among the spectators were Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Minister of Culture Pak Chun Nam, Chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of the Unions of Literature and Arts An Tong Chun, officials concerned and officials, creators and artistes in the fields of culture and arts.
					
					 The players displayed in each event their sports technique they steadily trained true to the Party's policy for mass sports, team spirit and fair play. 
					
					 Ball games, defence sports games, Yut games and other amusement games revved up the atmosphere of the stadium. 
					
					 The art education group placed first in total points.

articles.title: Sci-Tech Presentation in Field of Post and Telecommunications Held
articles.content:
Sci-Tech Presentation in Field of Post and Telecommunications Held
 Sariwon, November 4 (KCNA) -- A national sci-tech presentation in the field of post and tele-communications took place in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province from November 1 to 4.
					 Present there were scientists, technicians, workers, teachers, researchers, three-revolution team members and officials of more than 20 units such as provincial telecommunication management bureaus, industrial establishments under the Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications, Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology and University of Sciences.
					
					 Presented there were at least 300 valuable papers conducive to ensuring speed and security of communications through the dynamic struggle for putting communication on a modern, IT and scientific bases.
					
					 The participants introduced successes and experience gained in the work to develop communications of the country true to the Party's plan and intention and exchanged views on the issues arising in generalizing them.

articles.title: Big Efforts Paid to Upgrading at Kim Il Sung University
articles.content:
Big Efforts Paid to Upgrading at Kim Il Sung University
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Il Sung University in the DPRK launched a vigorous drive to further strengthen itself into the first-class university in the world.
					 The university has set prospective goals to closely combine education with scientific researches and develop the university into the one with a main emphasis on the training of creative talents and creation of the latest scientific theories and technologies.
					
					 A brisk work is going on to improve all teaching programs and the education system and management of teaching at colleges and faculties of the university.
					
					 Social scientists of the university wrote more than 100 kinds of textbooks and references and thousands of degree theses and essays.
					
					 Its teachers and researchers in natural science section presented 80-odd treatises to prestigious international academic magazines and authored textbooks and references in some 140 subjects.
					
					 At present, the university directs big efforts to realizing the integration of education, scientific research and production and bringing the education closer to the realities.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent his historic letter to the teaching staff and students of Kim Il Sung University on its 70th founding anniversary, in which he set forth the important tasks for turning the university into the first-class one.

articles.title: Solar-powered Ferryboats Start Service in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Solar-powered Ferryboats Start Service in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- Solar-powered ferryboats, Okryu Nos. 1, 2 and 3, started their service in the Taedong River flowing through Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					 The ships, built at the Ryongnam Dockyard with indigenous technology and efforts, can run for eight hours at one time, according to Yun Hyok, captain of Okryu No. 1.
					
					 Each boat has a displacement of 45 tons without noise and it can sail at 6kns and accommodate 50 to 60 passengers.
					
					 Choe Mi Gyong, an official of the Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport, told KCNA that the ships are to run between Kim Il Sung Square and the Tower of the Juche Idea in rush hours. They are also used for citizens and foreigners' sightseeing while ensuring ordered service.

articles.title: Highest Yield of Cocoons in Jagang Province
articles.content:
Highest Yield of Cocoons in Jagang Province
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- Jagang Province of the DPRK has recorded the highest yield in sericulture this year by producing several hundred more tons of cocoons as against last year, the peak year in production.
					 Through a drive to put the sericulture on a scientific basis, the province turned out 5,000 more tons of mulberry leaves than last year. In particular, the farms in Songgan, Chosan and Jonchon counties produced one more ton of mulberry leaves per hectare.
					
					 Jagang Province is famous for sericulture in the country.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts Park Geun Hye Group for Its Persistent Racket for Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts Park Geun Hye Group for Its Persistent Racket for Confrontation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) --The  Park Geun Hye group of traitors, finding itself in a tight corner inside and outside south Korea, is persistently resorting to the reckless racket for confrontation with the DPRK.
					 There took place in Phaju City, Kyonggi Province recently a ground-breaking ceremony of what the Park regime calls "Memorial for June 25 war south Korean abductees" at which Hong Yong Phyo, puppet minister of Unification, talked such nonsense that "the issue of the wartime south Korean abductees is the one concerning ethics and natural law to be settled at any cost" and that he "would quickly complete a report on the truth behind the south Korean abductees on the basis of all information gathered over the last five years so that it might be properly recorded in history."
					
					 This is another intolerable grave politically-motivated provocation to the DPRK and an unbearable insult to the south Koreans who came over to the northern half of the Republic as this revealed a cynical ploy to intensify the moves for the confrontation with it.
					
					 Such attitude of failing to distinguish the coming over to the north of one's accord from abduction is a nonsensical act which can be perpetrated only by the Park group hell-bent on the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 As for those described by the south Korean puppet forces as "the wartime south Korean abductees", they were the persons who came over to the northern half of the Republic in quest of truth and a worthwhile life during the last Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 They included Kim Kyu Sik, Choe Tong O and other patriotic figures, businessmen, persons of culture, scholars and the young men and women who voluntarily joined the Korean People's Army. Their families and relatives in south Korea are well aware of what a worthy and happy life they led in the DPRK through several reunions of divided families and relatives in the north and the south.
					
					 All those who had visited their native places in south Korea returned home as they knew well their coming over to the north was a just choice without any regret.
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime is the chieftain of abduction and human rights abuses.
					
					 Traitor Park fabricated the "law on the human rights in the north" early in March which her predecessors dared not do so.
					
					 She went the lengths of including in it even the provision calling on the puppet Ministry of Unification to work out and carry out a plan for "south Korean abductees" and report on the results to the "National Assembly." 
					
					 She is agitating "defection from the north" in violation of the UN Charter and international law, personally planning and commanding the abduction of inhabitants of the DPRK.
					
					 Even at this moment they are unhesitatingly committing atrocities against humanity by keeping inhabitants of the north including 12 women employees in custody in a remote place after abducting them in broad daylight.
					
					 It is the height of shamelessness for such criminals to talk about the "issue of wartime south Korean abductees", vociferating about "ethics" and "natural law."
					
					 The confrontation hysteria kicked up by the puppet regime to falsify truth with lies and fabrications and desperately stir up bad blood towards compatriots deserves rebuff and condemnation by all the fellow countrymen.
					
					 They will never pardon the extremely hideous provocations made by the Park regime over the non-existent "issue of wartime south Korean abductees."

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Opposes Park Geun Hye's Designation of Puppet PM
articles.content:
Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore on Nov. 3 carried an editorial in protest against Park Geun Hye's designation of the puppet prime minister.  
					 It said that the designation of the "prime minister" without consultation with the ruling and opposition parties, far from accepting the public opinion, can not be construed otherwise than an intention not to follow the will of the people.
					
					 Such "prime minister" is no more than the temporary bulletproof vest of Park Geun Hye, it noted, warning that if Park does not drop her ambition to keep holding power, the anger of the people will grow.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Flails Park Geun Hye's Self-opinionated Reshuffle of Cabinet
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Flails Park Geun Hye's Self-opinionated Reshuffle of Cabinet
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News on Nov. 3 carried an editorial titled "President Park, be ready to step down unless bulletproof Cabinet reshuffle is stopped,"
					 Chongwadae resorts to this or that way to make the public understand Park's new designation of the "prime minister" but all the opposition parties demand the withdrawal of reshuffle and even the ruling party terms it an unilateral reshuffle, the editorial said.
					
					 It has been confirmed again that the "president" is keen on staying in power though the administration is stopped due to the disclosure of the "Park Geun Hye, Choe Sun Sil scandal", it held.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 We cannot accept Park as the leader steering the administration.
					
					 Opposition party officials demanded her resignation.
					
					 The only way is for her to withdraw the reshuffle immediately and candidly confess before the people what she has done and face the prosecution's investigation.
					
					 She should quit "presidency".
					
					 The people have already impeached the "president" in mind.

articles.title: Dissolution of Jongyongryon Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Dissolution of Jongyongryon Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- South Korean public is becoming increasingly vocal demanding the dissolution of the "National Federation of Businessmen" (Jongyongryon) after the disclosure of the fact that Jongyongryon collected money from businesses to build the Mir Foundation and the K Sports Foundation at the instruction of Chongwadae, according to reports.
					 On Nov. 1 media of south Korea reported that a vice-chairman of Jongyongryon confessed at the prosecution that money was collected to build the Mir Foundation at the instruction of Chongwadae, thereby making an investigation into the businesses which donated money inevitable.
					
					 It was reported that the money Jongyongryon collected from Samsung Electronics, Hyundai Motors and other businesses amounted to nearly 77 billion won.
					
					 It is not the first time that Jongryongryon collected slush funds in collusion with the regime.
					
					 The amount of money Jongryongryon collected from businesses in obedience to power surpassed 300 billion won, the reports noted.
					
					 People from all walks of life and media of south Korea said Jongyongryon was an assistant supervisor who moved at the instruction of Chongwadae whereas businesses were no more than temporarily hired actors.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Stage Actions in Demand of Park Geun Hye's Resignation
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Stage Actions in Demand of Park Geun Hye's Resignation
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. have been on a demonstration outside the puppet consulate general in Los Angeles in demand of the resignation of Park Geun Hye, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The demonstrators demanded Park Geun Hye step down for the disgraceful monopolization of administration.
					
					 There took place a demo of Koreans in Washington that day.
					
					 Organizations of Koreans in the U.S. said they would hold large-scale rallies in different places of the U.S. in solidarity with the people's all-out action in south Korea on Nov. 12.
					
					 Meanwhile, Koreans in Canada held a rally in Toronto on Oct. 29 to denounce the Park Geun Hye's monopolization of administration and demand her resignation.
					
					 The participants in the rally said Park has already lost her qualifications, demanding she step down at an early date.
					
					 They underlined the need to dissolve the "National Federation of Businessmen", an organization supporting the "Oboi Federation" which a lackey of power, and sternly punish those related to it and businesses.
					
					 South Korean students studying in the U.S. and Australia staged demos and issued declarations on Nov. 1.

articles.title: Koreans in China Demand Punishment of Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
Koreans in China Demand Punishment of Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China on Nov. 2 made public a statement denouncing the Park Geun Hye group of traitors for their monopolization of administration.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The scandal which shocked the people clearly proved that the Park regime is the most abnormal and stupid one.
					
					 It is crystal clear that not only the south Koreans but all other compatriots will suffer shame and disaster if she is allowed to stay in the "presidential office".

articles.title: Anniversary of DIU Marked by Nigerian Website
articles.content:
Anniversary of DIU Marked by Nigerian Website
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted special write-ups on its website on Oct. 12 and 17 on the occasion of the 90th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 The article titled "Genuine teacher of Hwasong Uisuk School" noted that President Kim Il Sung, who studied at the school and explored a fresh road of the Korean revolution, formed the DIU on Oct. 17, 1926, adding that there is no such great man who has been profoundly admired by all people century after century as the President.
					
					 The article titled "The DIU, roots of the Workers' Party of Korea" introduced the immediate tasks and final goal of the DIU.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The members of the DIU were the vanguard fighters of revolution who pioneered a fresh road of the Korean revolution.
					
					 They were passionate revolutionaries with the transparent anti-imperialist spirit of independence as they held Kim Il Sung as the leader of revolution, the sun of the nation and the center of the cohesion and unity in the early years of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) regards the principle of independence set by the DIU as the firm guidelines of its building and activities.
					
					 The members of the WPK always stand in the van of the advance for building a socialist power desired by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and led by HE Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Russian Expert on Denuclearization on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Russian Expert on Denuclearization on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- A senior researcher at the Center for Korean Studies of the Institute for the Far East under the Russian Academy of Sciences referred to the issue of denuclearization of the Korean peninsula, when interviewed by internet news Pravda. Ru on Oct. 31.
					 Recalling that denuclearization of the Korean peninsula had once been tabled at the six-party talks, he went on:
					
					 Nuclear submarines, carriers and bombers are maneuvering in south Korea. The U.S. could have built a missile defense system in south Korea, regardless of whether the DPRK had access to nukes or not.
					
					 Not only Russia but also China understand the reason why the DPRK had access to nukes and well know that the U.S. is about to deploy interceptor missile system to contain Russia and China.
					
					 The DPRK clarified that it would not use the nukes first unless it is invaded but the theory of preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK and Russia still exists in the U.S.
					
					 Russia and China should demand the U.S. retract the plan of preemptive nuclear strike.

articles.title: DPRK's Proposal for Founding Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo Supported by Egyptian Newspaper
articles.content:
DPRK's Proposal for Founding Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo Supported by Egyptian Newspaper
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The Egyptian newspaper Al Akhbar Almassay carried an article titled "The most realistic way of Korea's reunification" on Oct. 28.
					 The article said that President Kim Il Sung put forward the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK) at the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in Oct. 1980, adding:
					
					 The proposal is the most realistic and fair one that makes it possible to reunify the country independently and peacefully on the principle of great national unity.
					
					 This proposal calls for reunifying Korea by founding a Federal Republic through the establishment of a unified national government on the condition that the north and the south recognize and tolerate each other's ideologies and social systems, a government in which the two sides are represented on an equal footing and under which they exercise regional autonomy with equal rights and duties.
					
					 The struggle of the WPK and the Korean people for achieving national reunification, the supreme national desire, will bear a shining fruit before long thanks to the wise guidance of the respected HE Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: S. Korea Should Pay for Park Geun Hye's Mistakes: U.S. Paper
articles.content:
S. Korea Should Pay for Park Geun Hye's Mistakes: U.S. Paper
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. paper Wall Street Journal in an editorial on Oct. 31 said Park Geun Hye has followed in the footsteps of her father, the dictator, and south Korea should pay for the dark past of politics-business nexus.
					 Referring to the "Park Geun Hye, Choe Sun Sil scandal", the paper noted that Park Geun Hye made a commitment to "democratization of economy" during the "presidential election campaign" in 2012 but since her seizure of power she has pursued pro-business policy.
					
					 It pointed out that Park Geun Hye has repeated the politics-business nexus dating back to the Park Chung-Hee rule.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona batallon de operacion especial de Unidad 525 de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona batallon de operacion especial de Unidad 525 de EPC
Pyongyang, 4 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono el batallon de operacion especial adscrito directamente a la Unidad 525 del EPC.
					El Presidente hizo organizar personalmente dicho batallon y acondicionar excelentemente su cuartel.
					
					Luego de recorrer el dormitorio, la sala de educacion, el comedor, la sala universal de ejercicios y la otra de ejercicio de natacion, el Presidente dirigio en el campo de ejercicios al aire libre varios entrenamientos militares de los combatientes.
					
					Los uniformados del batallon que tienen como su mision principal de combate eliminar a las escorias humanas, que cometen los archi-crimenes intolerables de Chongwadae, el gobierno titere y la capa militar del Sur de Corea, mostraron sin reservas el poderio de ellos mismos perfectamente listos para cumplir de modo independiente y activo los deberes asumidos.
					
					Son valientes todos los militares, senalo el Presidente y agrego que ellos aciertan a los blancos con todas las armas incluyendo pistola o fusil automatico, y parece que las balas tienen ojos. Y evaluo altamente los exitos de ejercicios de militares diciendo que todos son capaces de combatir uno contra cien enemigos. 
					
					Este batallon es la unidad de combate mas apreciada y mas confiable del Comandante Supremo, subrayo y presento las tareas que se incumben al batallon.
					
					Expuso la esperanza y conviccion de que los militares del batallon, que tiene la mision importante de dar punaladas al corazon de enemigo y eliminar completamente su baluarte, cumpliran excelentemente con su honrosa mision militar y les dio como recuerdo el binoculo y el fusil automatico y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el vicemariscal del EPC Ri Myong Su, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, y el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres Ri Yong Gil, primer subjefe y director general de Operaciones, del Estado Mayor General del EPC.

articles.title: Instituto Superior Politico Kumsong acoge 70o aniversario de fundacion
articles.content:
Instituto Superior Politico Kumsong acoge 70o aniversario de fundacion 
Pyongyang, 4 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Instituto Superior Politico Kumsong acogio el 70o aniversario de su fundacion. 
					Es una fidedigna base del partido que forma a los cuadros politicos juveniles y de organizaciones de masas. 
					
					Percatado de la importancia de la formacion de cuadros juveniles despues de la liberacion del pais, el Presidente Kim Il Sung fundo la Escuela Central de Cuadros Juveniles, antecesora del instituto, el 5 de noviembre del 35 (1946) de la Era Juche.
					
					E hizo continuar la formacion de cuadros aun en el periodo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y visito el plantel docente para dirigir el mejoramiento de las labores de educacion y gestion. 
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il instruyo denominar el instituto con el otro nombre del Presidente Kim Il Sung que le dedicaron los comunistas jovenes como testimonio de gran veneracion. 
					
					Aun en medio de las dificultades que atravesaba el pais, hizo construir un nuevo edificio docente, envio reiteradamente modernas instalaciones didacticas y dirigio sabiamente para que el instituto cumpliera con su mision y deber de formar a los funcionarios de la Union de la Juventud y de entidades de masas. 
					
					En el trayecto de 70 anos del Instituto Superior Politico Kumsong estan registrados los meritos orgullosos de haber preparado a los educadores prestigiosos y la solida base material-tecnica segun la autoctona orientacion correspondiente de los grandes Lideres antecesores y formado a los funcionarios que juegan el papel protagonico en el desarrollo de la Union de la Juventud y las organizaciones de masas. 
					
					El acto conmemorativo de la efemeride tuvo lugar el viernes con la participacion del vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, y los funcionarios del CC del PTC, las entidades de masas, los centros de formacion de cuadros partidistas y de ramas concernientes, los funcionarios, profesores, empleados y matriculados del instituto. 
					
					En la ocasion fue transmitido el mensaje de felicitacion enviado por el Comite Central del PTC a los funcionarios, profesores, empleados y estudiantes del plantel docente.
					
					Terminado el acto, los participantes recorrieron el lugar de exhibicion de exitos de ciencias pedagogicas del instituto y presenciaron la funcion artistica preparada por los profesores y estudiantes.

articles.title: Tiene lugar 47a Competencia Deportiva de Artistas
articles.content:
Tiene lugar 47a Competencia Deportiva de Artistas
Pyongyang, 4 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 4 en el Estadio Kim Il Sung la 47a Competencia Deportiva de Artistas.
					Las bandas de cinematografia, escenografia y educacion de arte disputaron en los partidos de futbol, voleibol, atletismo, lucha de cuerda y otras disciplinas.
					
					Vieron la competencia el vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, el ministro de Cultura Pak Chun Nam, el presidente del Comite Central de la Federacion General de Escritores y Artistas de Corea, An Tong Chun, los funcionarios interesados y los funcionarios, creadores, artistas, profesores y estudiantes del sector de literatura y arte. 
					
					Los jugadores demostraron bien sus tecnicas deportivas, adiestradas en los dias de creacion artistica en acato a la orientacion del Partido sobre el desarrollo de deportes masivos, y su espiritu colectivista y noble moral de juego. 
					
					Aumentaron el clima de torneo los juegos de pelota y de deportes militares y los de recreo y diversion como Yut. 
					
					El sector de educacion de arte ocupo el primer lugar en la clasificacion general.

articles.title: ACNC comenta furia conflictiva de la horda de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
ACNC comenta furia conflictiva de la horda de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 4 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Los compinches traidores de Park Geun-hye, que se hallan en el aprieto por dentro y por fuera, continuan con su inutil campana conflictiva anti-RPDC.
					En la llamada ceremonia de inicio de la construccion del "museo memorial de los secuestrados por el Norte de Corea durante la guerra del 25 de junio" que tuvo lugar hace poco en la ciudad de Phaju de la provincia de Kyonggi, el ministro surcoreano de Unificacion, Hong Yong Phyo, disparateo que el "problema de esos secuestrados es un asunto moral y etico que debe ser resuelto sin falta". Y agrego que "terminaria lo antes posible el 'informe de la verdad de los secuestrados por el Norte', que resume los datos recogidos durante 5 anos pasados, para convertirlo en el digno registro de la historia".
					
					Este chisme expone el malsano intento de recrudecer la campana conflictiva anti-RPDC, siendo una grave e imperdonable provocacion politica a la RPDC e insoportable insulto a los que pasaron a la RPDC por la causa justa. 
					
					A los pandilleros de Park, habituados a los actos conflictivos, son sinonimos la palabra "pasar por motivos justos" y el "secuestrado".
					
					Los "secuestrados por el Norte", al decir de los titeres surcoreanos, son los que pasaron voluntariamente a la RPDC en busca de la verdad y vida autentica durante la pasada guerra coreana. 
					
					Las figuras patrioticas como Kim Kyu Sik y Choe Tong O, los empresarios, los hombres de cultura, los sabios y los integrantes de la tropa de voluntarios vivieron digna y felizmente en el regazo de la RPDC. Lo saben muy bien sus familiares y parientes, que viven en el suelo surcoreano, a traves de los encuentros de familiares y parientes separados sostenidos en varias ocasiones.
					
					Convencidos de que su paso al Norte fue una opcion justa, ninguno de ellos se ha quedado en el Sur de Corea cuando tuvieron la oportunidad de visitar sus tierras natales.
					
					La horda titere surcoreana es la cabecilla de secuestro y violacion de derechos humanos.
					
					Park invento por fin a principios de marzo de este ano la llamada "ley de DDHH del Norte", a lo que no se atrevieron ni sus antecesores, y estipulo en ella que el Ministerio de Unificacion traza e impulsa el plan referente a los "secuestrados por el Norte" y avisa su resultado a la "Asamblea Nacional".
					
					Planificando y controlando directamente el secuestro a los habitantes norcoreanos, ella agita abiertamente la "fuga del Norte" en violacion de la Carta de la ONU y las leyes internacionales.
					
					Sus compinches raptaron a plena luz del dia a los habitantes norcoreanos, incluyendo 12 empleadas, y les cometen vejaciones anti-eticas en lugares apartados.
					
					Sin embargo, esos tipejos hablan cinicamente del "asunto de secuestrados por el Norte en el tiempo de guerra" usando expresiones como "moralidad" y "etica".
					
					La furia conflictiva de ellos es rechazada duro por todos los compatriotas.
					
					La nacion coreana no perdonara jamas los perversos actos provocativos de la horda de Park que recrudece las intrigas anti-RPDC inventando el problema de "secuestrados en el tiempo de guerra".
